languages.text: {n}Чувства постепенно возвращаются к вам. Тело все еще болит, но уже не умирает. Раны на скорую руку стянуты металлическими скобами, шея испещрена следами инъектора, словно швейная подушечка для игл. Кто бы ни оказывал вам первую помощь, он вряд ли обладал квалификацией хирургеона, которого можно допускать к высокой персоне Вольного Торговца.{/n}

{n}Sensation slowly returns to you. Your body is still in pain, but you are no longer on the brink of death. Your wounds have been crudely closed with metal clamps, and your throat is pocked with injector tracks, as though you have been wearing a neck pillow of needles. The one who rendered this first aid to you was certainly not a qualified chirurgeon, someone who would typically be permitted to minister to the person of the illustrious Rogue Trader.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Чувства постепенно возвращаются к вам. Тело все еще болит, но уже не умирает. The one who rendered this first aid to you was certainly not a qualified chirurgeon, someone who would typically be permitted to minister to the person of the illustrious Rogue Trader.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的身体慢慢地恢复了感知。尽管浑身上下依然剧痛不止，但你已经没有生命危险了。你身上的伤口被人用金属夹粗暴地缝了起来，喉咙上布满了注射器的痕迹，就仿佛你的脖子上一直插着一大堆针头一样。对你进行这种急救的人，绝对不是什么合格的外科医生，不是那种通常会为尊贵的行商浪人服务的人员。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sensation slowly returns to you. Your body is still in pain, but you are no longer on the brink of death. Your wounds have been crudely closed with metal clamps, and your throat is pocked with injector tracks, as though you have been wearing a neck pillow of needles. The one who rendered this first aid to you was certainly not a qualified chirurgeon, someone who would typically be permitted to minister to the person of the illustrious Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的身体慢慢地恢复了感知。尽管浑身上下依然剧痛不止，但你已经没有生命危险了。你身上的伤口被人用金属夹粗暴地缝了起来，喉咙上布满了注射器的痕迹，就仿佛你的脖子上一直插着一大堆针头一样。对你进行这种急救的人，绝对不是什么合格的外科医生，不是那种通常会为尊贵的行商浪人服务的人员。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Recuperas poco a poco la sensación. Te sigue doliendo todo, pero ya no estás al borde de la muerte. Tus heridas han sido cerradas de forma rudimentaria con abrazaderas de metal y tu garganta está llena de marcas de inyecciones, como si te hubieran puesto un collarín hecho de agujas. Quienquiera que te haya proporcionado primeros auxilios dista mucho de ser un cirujano cualificado de los que normalmente tratarían a alguien tan insigne como un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sensation slowly returns to you. Your body is still in pain, but you are no longer on the brink of death. Your wounds have been crudely closed with metal clamps, and your throat is pocked with injector tracks, as though you have been wearing a neck pillow of needles. The one who rendered this first aid to you was certainly not a qualified chirurgeon, someone who would typically be permitted to minister to the person of the illustrious Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Recuperas poco a poco la sensación. Te sigue doliendo todo, pero ya no estás al borde de la muerte. Tus heridas han sido cerradas de forma rudimentaria con abrazaderas de metal y tu garganta está llena de marcas de inyecciones, como si te hubieran puesto un collarín hecho de agujas. Quienquiera que te haya proporcionado primeros auxilios dista mucho de ser un cirujano cualificado de los que normalmente tratarían a alguien tan insigne como un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}徐々に感覚が戻ってきた。身体はまだ痛みに耐えているが、死の淵にいるような気はしない。傷口は金属製のクランプで雑にふさがれ、喉には針の首枕をしていたかのように注射器の跡がポツポツとついている。通常は自由開拓者を介助する権利をもつチラージョンから治療を受けるものだが、応急処置を施した人物が資格を持っていないのは明らかだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sensation slowly returns to you. Your body is still in pain, but you are no longer on the brink of death. Your wounds have been crudely closed with metal clamps, and your throat is pocked with injector tracks, as though you have been wearing a neck pillow of needles. The one who rendered this first aid to you was certainly not a qualified chirurgeon, someone who would typically be permitted to minister to the person of the illustrious Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}徐々に感覚が戻ってきた。身体はまだ痛みに耐えているが、死の淵にいるような気はしない。傷口は金属製のクランプで雑にふさがれ、喉には針の首枕をしていたかのように注射器の跡がポツポツとついている。通常は自由開拓者を介助する権利をもつチラージョンから治療を受けるものだが、応急処置を施した人物が資格を持っていないのは明らかだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du spürst langsam wieder etwas. Dein Körper schmerzt noch immer, doch du stehst nicht mehr an der Schwelle des Todes. Deine Wunden wurden krude mit metallenen Klammern verschlossen, und dein Hals ist voller Injektorspuren, als hättest du ein Nackenkissen aus Nadeln getragen. Diese Erste Hilfe hat gewiss kein qualifizierter Chirurgeum geleistet, obwohl nur einem solchen üblicherweise gestattet ist, {mf|den illustren Freihändler|die illustre Freihändlerin} zu verarzten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sensation slowly returns to you. Your body is still in pain, but you are no longer on the brink of death. Your wounds have been crudely closed with metal clamps, and your throat is pocked with injector tracks, as though you have been wearing a neck pillow of needles. The one who rendered this first aid to you was certainly not a qualified chirurgeon, someone who would typically be permitted to minister to the person of the illustrious Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du spürst langsam wieder etwas. Dein Körper schmerzt noch immer, doch du stehst nicht mehr an der Schwelle des Todes. Deine Wunden wurden krude mit metallenen Klammern verschlossen, und dein Hals ist voller Injektorspuren, als hättest du ein Nackenkissen aus Nadeln getragen. Diese Erste Hilfe hat gewiss kein qualifizierter Chirurgeum geleistet, obwohl nur einem solchen üblicherweise gestattet ist, {mf|den illustren Freihändler|die illustre Freihändlerin} zu verarzten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous retrouvez peu à peu vos sensations. Votre corps est toujours douloureux, mais vous n'êtes plus aux portes de la mort. Vos plaies ont été sommairement refermées à l'aide d'attaches métalliques et votre gorge est grêlée de marques d'injection, comme si vous aviez porté un collier fait d'aiguilles. De toute évidence, la personne qui vous a {mf|soigné|soignée} n'était pas un chirurgeon diplômé comme ceux à qui sont habituellement confiés les soins d'{mf|un|une} illustre {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sensation slowly returns to you. Your body is still in pain, but you are no longer on the brink of death. Your wounds have been crudely closed with metal clamps, and your throat is pocked with injector tracks, as though you have been wearing a neck pillow of needles. The one who rendered this first aid to you was certainly not a qualified chirurgeon, someone who would typically be permitted to minister to the person of the illustrious Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous retrouvez peu à peu vos sensations. Votre corps est toujours douloureux, mais vous n'êtes plus aux portes de la mort. Vos plaies ont été sommairement refermées à l'aide d'attaches métalliques et votre gorge est grêlée de marques d'injection, comme si vous aviez porté un collier fait d'aiguilles. De toute évidence, la personne qui vous a {mf|soigné|soignée} n'était pas un chirurgeon diplômé comme ceux à qui sont habituellement confiés les soins d'{mf|un|une} illustre {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hislerin yavaş yavaş geri geliyor. Vücudun hâlâ acı içinde olsa da artık ölümün eşiğinde değilsin. Yaraların, metal kıskaçlarla kabaca kapatılmış. Boğazında, sanki iğnelerle donatılmış bir boyunluk takmışsın gibi iğne izleri duruyor. Sana bu ilk yardımı uygulayanın normal şartlar altında şanlı bir Hür Tacir'e bakacak türden vasıflara sahip bir cerrah olmadığını anlıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sensation slowly returns to you. Your body is still in pain, but you are no longer on the brink of death. Your wounds have been crudely closed with metal clamps, and your throat is pocked with injector tracks, as though you have been wearing a neck pillow of needles. The one who rendered this first aid to you was certainly not a qualified chirurgeon, someone who would typically be permitted to minister to the person of the illustrious Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hislerin yavaş yavaş geri geliyor. Vücudun hâlâ acı içinde ama ölümün eşiğinden kurtulmuşsun. Yaraların, metal kıskaçlarla kabaca kapatılmış. Boğazında, sanki iğnelerle donatılmış bir boyunluk takmışsın gibi iğne izleri oluşmuş. Sana bu ilk yardımı uygulayan şahıs belli ki normal şartlar altında Hür Tacir'e bakacak türden vasıflı bir cerrah değilmiş.{/n}
